description: Biju Swasthya Kalyan Yojana provides cashless healthcare coverage of up to Rs. 5 lakh per family for critical ailments in empanelled hospitals.
key_features: Up to Rs. 5 lakh for men, Rs. 10 lakh for women per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh (men), Rs. 10 Lakh (women) per family per year

criteria: Families with annual income below Rs. 1.2 lakh (rural) or Rs. 1.8 lakh (urban)

steps: Verification through Aadhaar or ration card

special_notes: Higher coverage for women to address gender-specific health needs
